name: ContentDiffTest
description: Unit tests for the ContentDiff functionality in OpenApiDiff.

test_cases.name: testContentDiffWithOneEmptyMediaType
test_cases.description: Tests the incompatibility check when one media type is empty.

test_cases.name: testContentDiffWithEmptyMediaTypes
test_cases.description: Tests the unchanged check when media types are empty.

test_cases.name: testSameContentDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the unchanged check when content is the same.

test_cases.name: testAddedResponseContentTypeDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the compatibility check when a response content type is added.

test_cases.name: testRemovedResponseContentTypeDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the compatibility check when a response content type is removed.

test_cases.name: testAddedRequestContentTypeDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the compatibility check when a request content type is added.

test_cases.name: testRemovedRequestContentTypeDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the compatibility check when a request content type is removed.
